name: notion-integration
description: Interact with Notion workspaces via the Notion API. Search pages and databases, get/create/update pages, query databases, create database entries, and list blocks. Uses injected provider client for API access (BYOK).
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: notion_integration
toolDefinition.description: Interact with Notion workspaces: search, get/create/update pages, get/query databases, create database entries, and list blocks. Layer 1 skill using injected provider client for Notion API access.

action.description: search (search workspace), get_page (get a page), create_page (create a new page), update_page (update page properties), get_database (get database info), query_database (query a database), create_database_entry (add entry to database), list_blocks (list child blocks)

filter.description: Filter search results by object type (optional for search).

sort.description: Sort order for search results (default: last_edited).

pageSize.description: Number of results to return (default varies by action).

pageId.description: Notion page ID (required for get_page, update_page).

parentId.description: Parent page or database ID (required for create_page).

content.description: Page content as markdown or plain text (optional for create_page).

cover.description: Page cover image URL (optional for create_page).

properties.description: Property updates object (required for update_page, create_database_entry).

databaseId.description: Notion database ID (required for get_database, query_database, create_database_entry).

blockId.description: Block or page ID (required for list_blocks).
